meanings.definition: Loose-fitting trousers worn by both sexes in various southern Asian countries.
meanings.sent1: I love wearing my comfy pajamas to bed.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new set of colorful pajamas for her trip.
meanings.sent3: The pajamas were so big on him, he looked like he was swimming in them.
meanings.sent4: Her pajamas were like a cozy hug at the end of a long day.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the pajamas felt like a cloud against her skin.

meanings.definition: A suit of loose pants and jacket or shirt for sleeping in.
meanings.sent1: Every night, he changes into his favorite pajamas before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: She forgot to pack her pajamas for the sleepover.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to sneak into the pajamas left on the chair.
meanings.sent4: His pajamas were a shield against the nighttime chill.
meanings.sent5: The pajamas smelled of lavender and comfort, lulling her to sleep.
